page.title: 13Organised Games in School
page.content: We go to a Junior School.These are our organised games.Outdoor,we play rugby,soccer,cricket,tennis,hockey, cross-country running,athletics netball,rounders and volleyball. Indoor,chess,P.E. and computer games.I am going to tell you some things about netball.You have seven people in a team and two reserves.There is one goal shooter,goal attack,goal keeper, centre,wing attack,wing defence and goal defence.We play against other schools. This is about football. There are eleven players and two reserves in our school team.They have played 8 matches and won 5 games.They won the shield for our school for a year.We have a very good gymnastics club which sends people to Gloucester Acro Club. Rochelle Shepherd won two gold medals at the South West Acrobatic Championships.
